argosopentech/argos-translate

Library for translation without internet connection

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • browser extension for translating pages, subtitles, messages, with offline mode, custom translators, personal dictionary, open-source and privacy-focused
  • Browser extension displays translations alongside original text
  • bilingual web translator extension and userscript
  • macOS app for quick word lookup, translation, and OCR with support for multiple translation services
  • open-source platform for app localization and translation
  • Python library that aggregates multiple translation services
  • Translation platform for software projects, connects with version control, manages localization files
  • Browser extension and desktop app for translation using ChatGPT API
